original_text: The Canaanite people who lived near there saw how sad Joseph and his people were. So they gave Atad's threshing floor a different name. They called it ‘Abel Mizraim’. They said, ‘The Egyptians are showing that they are very sad because an important person has died.’
korean_text: 그 땅 거민 가나안 백성들이 아닷 마당의 애통을 보고 이르되 이는 애굽 사람의 큰 애통이라 하였으므로 그 땅 이름을 아벨미스라임이라 하였으니 곧 요단 강 건너편이더라

sentences.original_text: The Canaanite people who lived near there
saw how sad Joseph and his people were
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉과 그의 백성이 얼마나 슬퍼하는지 보았다

sentences.original_text: So they gave Atad's threshing floor a different name
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 아닷의 타작 마당에 다른 이름을 주었다

sentences.original_text: 'The Egyptians are showing that they are very sad'
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 사람들이 매우 슬퍼하고 있음을 보여주고 있다

sentences.original_text: because an important person has died'
